title: Am I the only "Quinn Main" who is excited for her rework
body: While i will miss melting enemy adc's with valor. i am also looking foreword to being able to hit 3 marked targets in a row and have a mini execute on her q every 2-5 seconds. R>aa>E>aa>Q>aa is going to be so much fun.

For instance, I don't understand either Mordekaiser or Sion's reworks (to be fair I didn't own them.)

But yeah I understood Fiora's rework--and I'll understand Poppy's rework and I understand Quinn's.

Yeah I own all these champs--but like, there are some champs that I own that I really couldn't tell one whit about.  Like Annie or Alistar.

INB4 mad cus bad

Well, I am not going to say 'mad cus bad', because they are legitimate complaints. On the off hand, pick diversity blows LoL out of the water. Unlike LoL, every hero in Dota has a place in some comp, whereas 65% of the champions in LoL are troll picks beyond Plat 1 - bar a couple players who are stubborn enough to make an inferior champion work sometimes.

Turn animation is super different compared to LoL's instant 180s. Turn speed goes into balance and makes certain heroes like Earthshaker unable to Q instantly behind him. 

Strategy, tactical picks, and item building are more important in Dota, where picking one of the two optimal mids is the extent of strategy in competitive LoL.

I'm not saying LoL is a horrible game, it is a very different game requiring different talents. I am aware I will get downvoted to oblivion for posting in favor of Dota on the LoL forums. I just tire of people playing 5 dota games and crying about it being broken. It is no different from dota players playing 5 LoL games and going to dota forums saying LoL is easy, shallow, and boring.

She was already one of the fastest characters in the game.  And she already had execute.  Her ult is more useful for roaming, but she's an ADC.  Roaming on an ADC is like roaming on a Nasus.  Yeah, you might pick up another kill in another lane; but that ADC is farming.

>She was already one of the fastest characters in the game. 

Every once in a very, very long while. and even then only if you were willing to use your ult preemptively, which was usually not the best choice.

>Her ult is more useful for roaming, but she's an ADC. 

She won't be played bot lane, just like she isn't played bot lane now. She'll got top or mid, push out the wave, and roam or gank. That's a pretty normal play pattern for those lanes.

Then they missed the mark (pun intended.)  She used to be a mediocre ADC and an excellent anti-ADC.

I'd say her split push is way stronger now. By third rank, with second tier boots and one ms based item, your ult makes you move at over 700ms. There's no other champion in the game that can sustain that level of movespeed indefinitely. 

Your passive can also crit now, and be proc'd more easily with the Q change, so you can also still duel quite well.  You did lose the execute on the ult, but I think that was a fair trade off for a 3 second cd ult that gives you that much mobility and map pressure.
